summary: Your project is in good health with a few outdated dependencies and configuration warnings. Recommended to update vulnerable packages and secure configurations.

vulnerability_findings.issue: Outdated version with known security vulnerabilities
Contains SSL-related security patches in newer versions

secret_findings.fix: Store API keys in .env and load them using os.getenv()

config_findings.fix: Set DEBUG=False before deploying to production

config_findings.issue: Database credentials exposed in environment file
config_findings.fix: Ensure .env is added to .gitignore and not pushed to repositories

ai_audit_summary.analysis: Detected insecure configuration patterns and outdated libraries. No critical secrets found. Suggested proactive security improvements.
recommendations: Upgrade Flask and Requests to latest secure versions
Use hashed passwords and environment-based secrets
Restrict CORS and disable debug mode in production
